Jamie Weiss
===========

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: Councilmember
Phone:
360-755-0531

Current Term: January 1, 2022 - December 31, 2025

This is Jamie Weiss' first term serving as Councilmember for Ward 5.

Jamie presently serves as a member of the Investment Committee and as Chair of the Public Safety Committee, in addition to being an alternate for the Parks & Recreation Board, Historical Preservation Board, SCOG/RTPO/MPO, and Audit & Finance Committee.

Return to Staff Directory
